page.title: 15Royal Darroch Hotel 1
page.content: In 1971 cults people objected to the building of a three storey hotel at Craigendarroch house at the corner of North Road and Cults avenue.Eventually they came to an agreement and the Royal Darroch was opened in 1972.In 1983 on Tuesday 25th October at 8.53am all people within at least three miles of Cults heard an explosion.At first people did not know what had happened, but they eventually found out that the Royal Darroch Hotel had exploded.The ground floor had collapsed into the basement and the front of the building was blown off as well as the roof.All the glass from the windows was showered everywhere damaging passing vehicles.To make matters worse there was a major fire as well.Within four minutes the first of the fire engines had arrived.
